Package xxl.core.util

This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Classifiable
    Objects implementing this interface can be classified.
    Decorator<T>
    A marker interface for decorators additionally providing a method that returns the decorated objects (decoree).
    Distance<T>
    An interface for determining the distance between two objects (see also Comparable ↔ Comparator).
    DistanceTo<T>
    An interface for determining the distance between two objects (see also Comparable ↔ Comparator).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayResizer
    The ArrayResizer provides methods that allow to modify the size of a given array after its construction.
    Arrays
    The class Arrays contains methods which are concerned with arrays of primitive Java types.
    BitSet
    This class is a replacement for java.util.BitSet which neither implements the interfaces Convertable nor Comparable.
    ConvertUtils
    Provides several static methods to convert one type to another.
    DatabaseAccess
    This class contains all neccessary information to connect to a database.
    DoubleArrays
    Static methods for dealing with double[] as numerical vectors.
    FileUtils
    Contains some useful static utility methods for dealing with files.
    Interval1D
    Class to implement one-dimensional intervals of any ordered data type.
    IntervalND
    Class to implement multi-dimensional intervals based on n intervals of class Interval1D.
    LongIdGenerator
    Handles identifyers which can be used for a lot of reasons.
    ObjectPool<E>
    An object pool allows the reuse of unneeded objects by storing them in a pool.
    Pair<E1,E2>
    A common task is to return two values from a function or keep two values stored together, because they are closely related.
    Quadruple<E1,E2,E3,E4>
    A class to store four values of (usually) different types.
    Signature  
    SignatureFactory  
    Strings
    This class provides some useful methods for dealing with Strings and parsing Strings.
    Triple<E1,E2,E3>
    A class to store three values of (usually) different types.
    XXLSystem
    The XXLSystem class contains system related methods.
    XXLSystem.Wrapper
    This class is a Wrapper for objects with the intention to distinguish two objects if and only if they refer to the same object.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WrappingRuntimeException
    This Exception is useful for wrapping arbitrary Exceptions.

Package xxl.core.util Description

This package provides miscellaneous utility classes that don't belong strictly to an other xxl-package. It contains classes to create and work with one- or multidimensional intervals and tuples or even bit sets, a class to work dynamically with arrays and a class delivering a new RuntimeException thats wraps arbitary exceptions.
